GoSeoul
Official URL: https://goseoul.space/
Primary language: English, Korean

Summary:
GoSeoul is a Seoul travel planning site for international visitors. It provides attraction discovery, one-day route builders, K-content-inspired picks, and place detail pages with map-ready travel context.

Key pages:
- Home: https://goseoul.space/
- Explore: https://goseoul.space/explore
- Course planner: https://goseoul.space/course
- K-content planner: https://goseoul.space/kcontent
- Place detail template: https://goseoul.space/place?id=place-001
- Editorial policy: https://goseoul.space/editorial

Crawling notes:
- Public pages are intended for indexing.
- Canonical, hreflang, Open Graph, and schema.org metadata are provided.
- Sitemap: https://goseoul.space/sitemap.xml
- RSS: https://goseoul.space/rss.xml
